label: 主計寮
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: A bureau in the Minbushō (the Popular Affairs Ministry) which was in charge of computing and budgeting the expenditure of income derived from taxes on craft produce and corvee labor (chō and yō) and from miscellaneous provincial tribute (p. 810). [民部省、調、庸] [HW: also read しゅけいりょう]
